code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Booking.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",email:"",date:"",time:"",service:""});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const response=await fetch("/api/bookings",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(formData)});if(response.ok){alert("Booking successful!");setFormData({name:"",email:"",date:"",time:"",service:""});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"booking",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Book an Appointment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"time",value:formData.time,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"service",value:formData.service,onChange:handleChange,required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select a Service"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Haircut",children:"Haircut"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Styling",children:"Styling"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Coloring",children:"Coloring"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Book Now"})]})]});};export default Booking;
